title: Peer Assessment-Based Project Design for Collaborative Learning Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic collaboration skills and foundational social studies knowledge
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment environment utilizing personal devices, with a focus on evaluating social problem-solving competencies through team interactions

learning_goals: Learners analyze self and peers' collaboration participation rates with over 80% accuracy through peer evaluation
Learners submit at least three improvement plans reflecting peer feedback during project execution
Learners experience evaluating individual contributions on a five-level scale using IMS-LD-based digital tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
